name: Top 100 English Words
description: Learn the most common English words to improve your vocabulary

cards.back: Lasting for a very short time.
The occurrence and development of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way.
Fluent or persuasive in speaking or writing.
Able to withstand or recover quickly from difficult conditions.
A typical example or pattern of something; a model.
Dealing with things sensibly and realistically in a way that is based on practical considerations.
Based on random choice or personal whim, rather than any reason or system.
Showing great attention to detail; very careful and precise.
The fact of two things being seen or placed close together with contrasting effect.
